attributes.action: Ensure that the next Prmie Minister is democratically chosen by the people of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to lobby  government to ensure that Gordon Brown isn't automatically given the right to be the next Prime Minister when Tony Blair steps down without the approval of the General Public. In simple terms we want to choose who our prime minister should be Gordon Brown should not think he can just be Prime Minister without a democratic vote vote
